meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny - I'm back with another groovy review that's sure to get you pumped up for some serious gaming action! Today, we're diving into the world of Deceive Inc., a multiplayer game that's got everyone talking (or shouting at each other, depending on the match).

First off, let me just say that Deceive Inc. is no ordinary multiplayer experience. It's like a secret agent training course in video game form - sneaky, clever, and a whole lot of fun! You play as spies, taking on missions and working together (or against) your opponents to get the job done. And when I say "get the job done," I mean that literally - there are no points for style or flair here; it's all about winning, baby!

Now, some critics out there have been raving about Deceive Inc.'s unique blend of strategy and action (check out PC Gamer's glowing review). Others have noted the game's creative take on multiplayer (The Games Machine gave it props for its stealthy approach). And then there are those who just want to get in, play some games, and forget about all the fuss (Shacknews' reviewer was all about that).

As for me? Well, let's just say I'm a bit of a wild card. I've been known to shout at my TV screen when my teammates fail to execute a plan (yes, it happens). But hey, that's just part of the fun! Deceive Inc.'s got its ups and downs, but overall, I'd say it's a real winner - especially if you're looking for something fresh and exciting.

So, what's the verdict? Well, let's just say that Deceive Inc. is doing some things right (80s from PC Gamer and The Games Machine) and others... not so much (60 from GameSkinny). But hey, who doesn't love a good underdog story?

All in all, I'd say Deceive Inc. is worth checking out - especially if you're up for a challenge or just want to play something new and cool. And don't worry about those bugs; it's all part of the fun (or at least, that's what I keep telling myself). So grab some popcorn, gather your squad, and get ready for some top-notch spy action!

Stay groovy, friends!
